Ideal to wear in the workplace or if you're in close contact with others. The shield can flip up to accommodate eating and drinking and is available in adult and kiddies size. ProductName: Adult Vi-Zip Cap with Face Shield
FullDescription: The Adult Vi-Zip Cap with Face Shield is an ideal safety visor that provides both protection and keeps you looking stylish. Features include a high-quality Barron 6 panel heavy brushed cotton peak cap with an easy to clean detachable protective face shield on the peak of the cap by means of a durable zipper. While the cap protects your eyes from sun rays, the transparent lightweight shield can protect your face and neck from droplets and splashes of germs, giving you maximum protection. FullDescription: The Non-Contact Infrared Thermometer is a great tool to get quick and accurate readings of customers' temperatures as they enter your premises. Features a fever alarm, with high accuracy readings, a 7-second auto shutdown function and a bright LCD to display readings after 0.5 seconds. No skin contact nis ecessary at all therefore no cross-contamination, making it safe to use daily, simply point and wait. This thermometer can also measure room, water and object temperatures. Suitable to use on both adults and infants and studies have shown forehead thermometers to be highly accurate. Includes batteries and comes packaged in a cardboard box. How To Use: Simply stand 5cm to 15cm away from the patient, point the infrared light directly at the forehead or temples and wait for the screen to display a temperature. Price Includes: 1 Colour, 1 Position Pad Print (Setup Fees Apply)
ShortDescription: How To Use: Simply stand 5cm to 15cm away from the patient, point the infrared light directly at the forehead or temples and wait for the screen to display a temperature.
Price Includes: 1 Colour, 1 Position Pad Print (Setup Fees Apply)

FullDescription: The Swiss Cougar Oxford Infrared Thermometer is a great non-contact thermometer that makes it easy to check the body temperature of staff and customers as they enter your store. Normal body temperature is considered to be between 36.5°C - 37.5°C. Made from ABS & PCB, the thermometer is a simple and practical tool to operate with a one-button measurement, one-button conversion mode and one-button search. Other features include a multi-group memory to store up to 50 readings, it can read temperatures between 32°C - 43°C, has an accuracy variance of 0.2 degrees, a light warning in green, yellow and red LCD display to indicate if the body temperature is normal, above average or if you have a fever and shows readings in 1 second! Its auto shutdown after 1 minute of non-use helps to save battery life and it uses 2 x AAA alkaline batteries to function. No skin contact necessary at all, simply point and wait. Packaged in a pre-branded Swiss Cougar gift box. How To Use: Simply stand 3cm - 5cm away from the patient, point the infrared light directly at the forehead or temples and wait for the screen to display a temperature. Please Note: 2 x AAA batteries not included.
ShortDescription: Please Note: 2 x AAA batteries not included.

FullDescription: The Nurek UV Sterilizer Lamp is a futuristic-looking tool designed to make sure surfaces are free from bacteria thanks to the latest technology in ultraviolet light. The plastic sterilizer lamp deconstructs and breaks down the presence of bacteria on all surfaces by simply holding the lamp about 1-2cm away from the surface for a few seconds while the ultraviolet light does its thing! Pocket-sized and fits in the palm of your hand for a comfortable grip, use it on your keyboard, phone, steering wheel or any other commonly touched surface. Includes a USB charging cable, user manual and a rechargeable battery. Features:- Bulb Power: 1.5W- Wavelength: 275nm- Voltage: 3V - CE, RoHS & germicidal effectiveness certification available Use & Care: Avoid contact with skin and eyes. Made from food-grade, non-toxic polyethylene resin, this nifty item is designed to lift your face mask away from your face and help you breathe easier while greatly minimizing fog on your glasses. Simply slide it into the inside of your mask and wear your mask as normal. Reusable and washable. Suitable for both kids and adult-sized masks and contains 5 units.

Avoid touching common surfaces in public with the Soroca Giftology Brass Tip Keychain (Anti-Microbial). Made from anti-bacterial brass that inhibits the growth of micro-organisms with a metal split ring key holder, the accessory is designed to be used on commonly touched ATM or elevator buttons in public spaces and can be attached to your keys for easy access. Remember to clean the item with disinfectant after use to get rid of germs picked up throughout the day.

ProductName: Castile UV-C Sterilisation Anti-Microbial RPET Laptop Backpack
FullDescription: The Castile UV-C Sterilisation Anti-Microbial RPET Laptop Backpack is the ultimate backpack for those tech-savvy people always on the go. Made from highly durable anti-microbial recycled 1680D RPET fabric, features include a spacious main storage compartment, multiple pockets for organization and storage, a padded 15.6" laptop pocket all with zippered closures, a USB output to charge your devices with, RFID pockets to protect your bank cards, pen loops, water bottle pocket on the side, a top carry handle and padded and adjustable carry straps. This stylish backpack also has a front pocket with a 5-minute UV-C sterilization compartment that works on power from a portable charger (not included) and allows you to keep your everyday essentials sanitized and free from germs by simply storing it in the pocket for 5 minutes and let technology do the rest! Available in black with a green RPET flag label. Please Note: Phone and accessories not included. Image is for display purposes only.

ProductName: Skole @memorii TWS Earbuds With UV-C Sterilization Case
FullDescription: Keep the music flowing while stopping germs from growing with the Skole @memorii TWS Earbuds With UV-C Sterilization Case. These in-ear TWS earphones are made from ABS plastic and have soft silicone covers to provide comfort to all-day users, with a 35mAh battery, a flip-open 400mAh charging case, auto-pairing functions so its easy to connect your device, 2 hours playtime, Bluetooth v5.0, 10m operation distance and supports call pick up with a mic for those hands-free phone calls. The carry case is equipped with UV sterilization which cleans and sterilizes your earbuds from harmful germs after use while they charge. Simply place the earbuds in the case, close the lid and the UV light with automatically sterilize them for 90 seconds. While the case is open the UV light process will stop to protect the user's eyes from the harmful UV-C light. Available in white.
